official_title: To extend until June 30, 1995, the temporary suspension of duties on self-folding telescopic shaft collapsible umbrellas.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through June 30, 1995, the suspension of duty on self-folding telescopic shaft collapsible umbrellas chiefly used for protection against rain.

titles.title: To extend until June 30, 1995, the temporary suspension of duties on self-folding telescopic shaft collapsible umbrellas.
